title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 5 - Attaching and Plugging Drip Tape to a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Attach drip tape to header pipe and plug end
subtasks: Attach drip tape to fitting by twisting to the right tightly
Punch hole in lay flat header with Phillips head screwdriver
Ensure proper screwdriver size to prevent leaks
Push fitting into hole and verify proper connection
Plug end of drip tape by cutting a piece, folding, and slipping into end
Ensure water flows to end of tape by turning on water and removing kinks
Secure drip tape with soil to prevent displacement by wind
